sentence.Network_en: There is great humanity in all the writings of Tolstoy.
sentence.Network_cn: 托尔斯泰所有的作品都充满了伟大的仁爱.

sentence.Network_en: Tolstoy's historicism is a reaction against a method of writing history.
sentence.Network_cn: 托尔斯泰的历史决定论是对一种写历史的方法的抗议.

sentence.Network_en: Tolstoy bombards you with twenty - two names.
sentence.Network_cn: 托尔斯泰一下子就抛给你 二十二 个人名.
